Title: Bethesda Softworks: Release Skyrim: Legendary Edition on PS4!
Overview:
TES V: Skyrim is one of the best RPG games which was released on PC PS3 and Xbox 360 in 2011 with the Legendary Edition released in 2013.

Unfortunately the PS3 and 360 are quite old consoles which cannot handle Skyrim at a high FPS level with Ultra graphics quality and fast load times.

Please port the game on PS4 a new generation console which architecture is similar to PC. It won't cost too much yet people will be happy to get back to Skyrim on a new hardware. 

P.S. Please feel free to make an Xbox One port as well yet we'd love to see Skyrim's true beauty on PS4. 

Thanks!
Letter Body: Release a FullHD version of Skyrim: Legendary Edition on PS4!
